email-verification.click_on_link: Click on the link in the email to begin.
email-verification.description: Please check your email and click on the link to verify your account. After verifying your email, you will need to login again.
email-verification.email_sent: We have sent a verification email to:
email-verification.emulator_description: Please click on the link in the terminal running your firebase emulator to verify your account. After verifying your email, you will need to login again.
email-verification.title: Verify your email inbox
errors.csrf_error:
A required security token was not found or was invalid.
 Refresh the page and try again.
errors.no_account: No Marble account found for this address.
great_rules_right_tools: Great rules are built with the <RightTools>right tools</RightTools>.
marble_description: Marble is a real time rule engine for fraud and compliance monitoring, designed for fintech companies and financial institutions.
reset-password.email_sent: An email has been sent to you with a link to create your password.

reset-password.wrong_place: Wrong place ? Go back to <SignIn>sign in page</SignIn>.
